tagline: A test-based feature location eclipse plug-in.
body:
### Requirements
Before you can install TaBuLeTa your system must address the following requirements:

* Operational System: any system able to run an instance of [Eclipse IDE](http://www.eclipse.org/downloads);

* Eclipse Version: we only tested TaBuLeTa with Eclipse JUNO on [SDK distribution](http://www.eclipse.org/downloads/packages/eclipse-classic-421/junosr1);

### Installation
To install the TaBuLeTa plug-in in your Eclipse please follow the steps above:

1.    Open your Eclipse IDE JUNO;
2.    Follow the path _**Help / Install New Software...**_;
3.    Then, add the following link: ```http://alcemirsantos.github.com/tabuleta/update```
4.    Select TabuLeTa and proceed until the finish the procedure.

### Author and Contributor
TaBuLeTa is currently developed by [@alcemirsantos](http://www.twitter.com/alcemirsantos).

### Support or Contact

Having trouble with installation or other issues? Please let me know. 

### Find Me...
[...on Twitter](http://www.twitter.com/alcemirsantos).
name: TaBuLeTa
